node.doctext:
<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Mon Aug 11 12:40:09 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="go ahead I'll listen" node_id="2114821" parent_e2node="2114820" author_user="Auspice">They're gonna grind you down until you're thin and tired, tired</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="IWhoSawTheFace" node_id="2114807" parent_e2node="2114811" author_user="rowtuh">I don't think the sun was up</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2114674" parent_e2node="2114814" author_user="eiloen">Banished</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2114827" parent_e2node="1066243" author_user="Glowing Fish">Outer Space Treaty</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Ancientsnow" node_id="2111739" parent_e2node="1827156" author_user="Bitriot">Prayer for Forgetting</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="930058" parent_e2node="930049" author_user="mofaha">she is not a servant to scattered branches</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="1471230" parent_e2node="296107" author_user="arieh">Passport</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Tem42" node_id="2114790" parent_e2node="1434996" author_user="Clockmaker">Miklagard</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mauler" node_id="2114753" parent_e2node="2114751" author_user="etouffee">August 6, 2014</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="etouffee" node_id="1229179" parent_e2node="1229175" author_user="Mer">today I met F. Scott Fitzgerald</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="DonJaime" node_id="2112212" parent_e2node="2112214" author_user="Bitriot">A Time Before the Witch</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Bitriot" node_id="2109641" parent_e2node="2109613" author_user="go ahead I'll listen">Fifteen words about love</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="2114792" parent_e2node="1950088" author_user="moeyz">Our music, in place of breadcrumbs, is there to help us find our way back home.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="go ahead I'll listen" node_id="1170305" parent_e2node="1047834" author_user="tandex">She is stupidly keeping herself a secret, when I know she has sparkly things to show me</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2106838" parent_e2node="1994065" author_user="haqiqat">Everything is made of sunlight and shit</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
node.title: Cool Nodes XML Ticker
